hero.headline: Build your website
hero.subtitle: A clean Next.js template with internationalization support. Perfect for simple independent websites and landing pages.

features.title: Everything you need for a modern website
features.subtitle: Clean, responsive, and ready to customize for your needs.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in support for multiple languages with automatic routing and localization.

stack.title: Modern Stack
stack.description: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4 for the best developer experience.

components.title: Server Components
components.description: Optimized performance with React Server Components and Next.js App Router.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Beautiful dark and light themes with smooth transitions and theme persistence.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Fully responsive layout that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.

ready.title: Production Ready
ready.description: Error handling, loading states, and SEO optimization built right in.

cta.title: Ready to build your website?
cta.subtitle: Get started with this clean, modern template today.

about.title: About ShipNow Basic
about.subtitle: A clean, modern Next.js template focused on internationalization and simplicity.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide developers with a clean, simple, and powerful foundation for building modern websites. We focus on essential features without unnecessary complexity.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To make internationalization accessible to everyone. Building multilingual websites should be simple and straightforward, not a complex undertaking.

i18n.title: Built for Global Reach
i18n.description: Complete internationalization support with 7 languages out of the box.

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Optimized with React Server Components and Next.js App Router for lightning-fast loading.

design.title: Beautiful Design
design.description: Clean, modern design with dark mode support and responsive layout.

tech.title: Built with Modern Technology
tech.nextjs: The React framework for production with App Router and Server Components.
tech.react: Latest React with concurrent features and improved performance.
tech.typescript: Full type safety and better developer experience.
tech.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.
tech.nextintl: Complete internationalization solution for Next.js applications.
tech.shadcn: Beautiful, accessible components built with Radix UI.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join developers who are building amazing multilingual websites with our template.

errors.resourceNotFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.invalidInput: Please check your input and try again.
errors.missingRequiredField: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.databaseError: Database error. Please try again later.
errors.externalServiceError: External service error. Please try again later.
